name: perplexity-search
description: Search the web using Perplexity's Search API for ranked, real-time web results with advanced filtering. Supports recency filtering (day/week/month/year) and returns structured results with titles, URLs, and snippets.
author: Craig Milligan

setup.instructions: Get your API key from https://perplexity.ai/account/api and add it to OpenClaw config under skills.perplexity-search.env.PERPLEXITY_API_KEY
